<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/dwarfemitterimpl/#ac22d4c7f337f37c3d391b848a6422923">emitAppleTypes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/acceltable">AccelTable&lt;AppleAccelTableStaticTypeData&gt;</a> &amp;Table);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Enumerate all string patches and write them into the destination section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Order of patches is the same as in original input file. To avoid emitting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same string twice we accumulate NextOffset value. Thus if string</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset smaller than NextOffset value then the patch is skipped (as that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// string was emitted earlier).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PatchTy&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> emitStringsImpl(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist">ArrayList&lt;PatchTy&gt;</a> &amp;StringPatches,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">                       uint64&#95;t &amp;NextOffset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;OutSection);</Highlight></CodeLine>
